attributes.action: help tackle the problem of obesity in Britain and request Gyms lower their prices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Britain has a Problem!
OBESITY
In 2003 there were 24.2million obese or overweight people in the UK. The Government are trying to contain this problem by launching mass media campaigns about the threats of obesity to your health. 
If gyms charged lower prices it would be easier for poorer people to go to the gym and lose weight.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
